review: Used to love this game before they put a "2" at the end of it. Now it is clearly only a cash grab.

i dont remember this game ever having a fun meta game
all you do is shoot shields for 3 minutes until everyone pops their ults for a MASSIVE WOW TEAMFIGHT. 
game is trash

Been here since the very start of Overwatch 1, still playing with the same group of people, we still meet up every week and have a blast.  No game has ever managed to hold that for us for that amount of time.

i haven't paid for the battle pass or even bought overwatch 1 and i still feel scammed

I do like waiting for multiple years to get three PVE maps that are basically the same quality (arguably worse) then Retribution or Storm Rising. Oh, when the game also no longer has a respect for it's players and is actively digging it's own grave. I actively miss lootboxes, and that's the saddest thing I've ever said.
winton jump winton zap winton punch winton nap winton ult winton dies winton cries

Tried to connect Steam to BattleNet for 15 minutes with the error "Prerequisite data was missing from session" to get a 5-minute match and the game crashed. After a free week a couple years ago, I have a mixed feeling about the game. On the one hand it seems to be a lot of gud stuff for beginners, but on the other hand the game is plays bad. Now it's just a horror, then I remember were free lootboxes after any match, from which I even got skins and still have, here it seems to have to live in the game to get only one. I'm also quite impressed that the game with such graphics managed to crash considering that I'm running Far Cry 4, GTA 5, Dying Light, and WOW STALKER, and this guys is worth a lot. Seriously, there is a huge SHOP button in the menu instead of a settings button.

ã€‚

cat

Once upon a time, I had a cat, I had ten dollars, I would buy it food for eight dollars, bathe it often, and it was very sticky to me.

Later, I took it out to play, passers-by thought it was cute, they fed it cat food, ham sausage, I was very unhappy because it was mine. I wanted to carry it home, but he broke away from me and meowed at the person who gave it good food, I hugged him a few times and he didn't go with me, and scratched me, so I turned around and left.....

Later, I came across it by chance on the road, and it was dirty. Passers-by will only give it good food and play with it, but they will not take it home and bathe it. It saw me and followed me home, I shut it out, it meowed outside the door, it was very uncomfortable,
but I wouldn't want it anymore
.

Definitivamente queda a deber en varios aspectos prometidos pero es un gran juego

I'm an original Overwatch 1 player with maybe 5-600 hours in OW1. I enjoyed OW1 even though I was late to join because it was so easy to get cosmetics (for free) and use all the characters (for free). Now the game has gone to crap. Everything that has any time put into it (like mythic skins) are pay walled behind an awful battle pass or sold for insane prices. New heroes aren't free unless you spend time leveling up the battle pass to rank 45 or unlock it through challenges in later seasons. If the new character is meta for comp- too bad, you can't use it until you pay up or spend hours grinding away levels. This is gone from a fun, roll of the dice for interesting cosmetic game to a piss poor money grab
